title: Cook
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Cook>>
<<Portrait|cook_happy>>
How's it goin'?
<</Textbox>>

[[That's all.|Cook.Bye]]

[[What do you know about $CLUE?|Cook.Question]]

title: Cook.Question
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
What do you know about $Culprit?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Cook>>
Hey, where'd you find this? I was looking all over for it.
<</Textbox>>


[[That's all.|Cook.Bye]]

[[When did you last see it?|Cook.Clue]]

[[Why was it at $LOCATION?|Cook.Upset]]

title: Cook.Clue
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
When did you last see it?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Cook>>
<<Portrait|cook_neutral>>
I saw that $CLUE before the, uh, 'incident'.
<</Textbox>>

[[Any idea who could have taken it?|Cook.Key]]

[[That's convenient|Cook.Upset]]

title: Cook.Upset
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
Looking all over? Sure you don't know why I found it at $LOCATION?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Cook>>
<<Portrait|cook_mad>>
With all due respect, Capitano, I don't appreciate being called a liar.
<</Textbox>>
<<set $CookLoyalty to $CookLoyalty - 1>>

//End of conversation

title: Cook.Key
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
Any idea who could have taken it?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Cook>>
<<Portrait|cook_neutral>>
No clue, it disappeared while I was out of the kitchen.
<</Textbox>>

//Clue Key Dialogue

[[That's all|Cook.Bye]]
